pkgmetadata.longdescription: Obsidian 2 is a modern and intuitive dark GTK theme designed specifically for GNOME desktop environments. Built upon the foundation of the Adwaita-Maia dark skin, this theme provides a sleek, professional appearance with carefully crafted visual elements that enhance the user interface experience. It is fully compatible with GTK 3.22 and later versions, including GNOME 49, with continuous improvements for both GTK3 and GTK4 applications. The theme features polished widgets, refined color schemes, and smooth transitions that create a cohesive desktop environment. For users running older systems with GTK 3.18 or Cinnamon 3.2 and below, the predecessor Obsidian 1 theme is available as an alternative. This actively maintained project ensures ongoing compatibility with the latest GNOME releases while preserving the distinctive dark aesthetic that makes Obsidian 2 popular among Linux desktop enthusiasts.

Obsidian 2 是一款专为 GNOME 桌面环境设计的现代化、直观的深色 GTK 主题。 基于 Adwaita-Maia 深色皮肤打造，该主题提供了简洁专业的外观，并精心设计了 视觉元素以增强用户界面体验。它完全兼容 GTK 3.22 及更高版本，包括 GNOME 49， 并持续改进对 GTK3 和 GTK4 应用程序的支持。该主题具有精致的部件、优化的配色 方案和流畅的过渡效果，营造出协调一致的桌面环境。对于运行 GTK 3.18 或 Cinnamon 3.2 及更早版本系统的用户，可以选择使用前代主题 Obsidian 1。 作为一个积极维护的项目，它确保与最新的 GNOME 版本保持兼容，同时保留了 使 Obsidian 2 在 Linux 桌面爱好者中广受欢迎的独特深色美学风格。
